summary: Best teacher ever :’)
title: Best teacher ever :’)
body:
You know you have the best teacher in the universe when she makes everything have some sort of reference to Harry Potter.

“Ok. Here is a picture of a glowing blue stag in a forest. And- yes,(insert my name),it is a patronus.”

““I see that (insert my name) has finished her work. There are four challenges: with the colours red,blue,green and yellow.”

Me: I choose blue. Ravenclaw.

Teacher: *rolls eyes but is trying not to laugh. She’s failing.* Good choice xD.

Thanks for making school great,miss c. :)

summary: Wizards are stupid to still use parchment. I understand why Rowling made them use it.. because aesthetic, but really, there is a...
body: Wizards are stupid to still use parchment. I understand why Rowling made them use it.. because aesthetic, but really, there is a reason why we switched to paper. The main reasons for this is that paper is cheaper and that it is easier to use for book binding and pressing. Also, poor vegetarian wizards, as parchment is made out of animal skin..

reblog.comment: Wizards are stupid to still use parchment. I understand why Rowling made them use it.. because aesthetic, but really, there is a reason why we switched to paper. The main reasons for this is that paper is cheaper and that it is easier to use for book binding and pressing. Also, poor vegetarian wizards, as parchment is made out of animal skin..

trail.content_raw: Wizards are stupid to still use parchment. I understand why Rowling made them use it.. because aesthetic, but really, there is a reason why we switched to paper. The main reasons for this is that paper is cheaper and that it is easier to use for book binding and pressing. Also, poor vegetarian wizards, as parchment is made out of animal skin..

The main reasons for this is that paper is cheaper and that it is easier to use for book binding and pressing. Also, poor vegetarian wizards, as parchment is made out of animal skin..

summary: Ok Rowling sucks, but you've got to admit, all the AUs, all the things people write about separately - they're pretty amazing...
body: Ok Rowling sucks, but you’ve got to admit, all the AUs, all the things people write about separately - they’re pretty amazing and the real reason why there are still so many HP fans. She’s created a world and we’re living in it now without her, because it’s ours to make now.

reblog.comment: Ok Rowling sucks, but you’ve got to admit, all the AUs, all the things people write about separately - they’re pretty amazing and the real reason why there are still so many HP fans. She’s created a world and we’re living in it now without her, because it’s ours to make now.

trail.content_raw: Ok Rowling sucks, but you’ve got to admit, all the AUs, all the things people write about separately - they’re pretty amazing and the real reason why there are still so many HP fans. She’s created a world and we’re living in it now without her, because it’s ours to make now.
trail.content: Ok Rowling sucks, but you’ve got to admit, all the AUs, all the things people write about separately - they’re pretty amazing and the real reason why there are still so many HP fans. She’s created a world and we’re living in it now without her, because it’s ours to make now.

summary: Harry’s warn out desk and the books he ordered because of Griphook.  (First summer back from Hogwarts) The books from left to...
caption:
Harry’s warn out desk and the books he ordered because of Griphook. 

(First summer back from Hogwarts)

The books from left to right: 

  • Magical Guardianship: What It Entails 
  • An Introduction to the Magical World: A Guide by the Ministry of Magic 
  • Official Heir Training Books 1-4 
  • The Ministry of Magic of the British Isles: The Complete Breakdown

tags: peter pettigrew but nobody likes him
harry potter as john mulaney quotes
honestly i could just see james and sirius for almost all of them
summary: The Marauders as John Mulaney Quotes Bc Im Jumping on the Bandwagon
body:
The Marauders as John Mulaney Quotes Bc Im Jumping on the Bandwagon

James Potter: When I walk down the street, I need everybody, all day long, to like me so much. It’s exhausting.

Sirius Black: Why do people do that? People always shush animals. They go, “hey, shush, shush, shush, shush.” They’ve never spoken.

Remus Lupin: Everybody get out of my way. I just want to sit here and feed my birds.

Peter Pettigrew: I quit drinking, because I used to drink too much, and then I would black out and I would “ruin” parties.

summary: All I got from that is :  1. Antonin was brave and it all worked out.  2. Barty called antonin his best friend and hugged him. ...
question: All I got from that is :  1. Antonin was brave and it all worked out.  2. Barty called antonin his best friend and hugged him.  3. Barty said that regulus was 'obligated' to like him.  Reg, barty, antonin, anything to say?
answer:
Regulus: I don’t really know what happened, all I know is that they’re friends again and Barty isn’t really that angry anymore.

Barty: I’m still really shocked… I never would have guessed that Antonin has feelings for ME. He’s so mean to me all the time so it’s just really surprising.

Antonin: I’m fucking annoyed that I had to tell the dickhead. He just better not make things fucking awkward.

reblog.comment:
Regulus: I don’t really know what happened, all I know is that they’re friends again and Barty isn’t really that angry anymore.

Barty: I’m still really shocked… I never would have guessed that Antonin has feelings for ME. He’s so mean to me all the time so it’s just really surprising.

Antonin: I’m fucking annoyed that I had to tell the dickhead. He just better not make things fucking awkward.

trail.content_raw:
Regulus: I don’t really know what happened, all I know is that they’re friends again and Barty isn’t really that angry anymore.

Barty: I’m still really shocked… I never would have guessed that Antonin has feelings for ME. He’s so mean to me all the time so it’s just really surprising.

Antonin: I’m fucking annoyed that I had to tell the dickhead. He just better not make things fucking awkward.
trail.content:
Regulus: I don’t really know what happened, all I know is that they’re friends again and Barty isn’t really that angry anymore.

Barty: I’m still really shocked… I never would have guessed that Antonin has feelings for ME. He’s so mean to me all the time so it’s just really surprising.

Antonin: I’m fucking annoyed that I had to tell the dickhead. He just better not make things fucking awkward.

summary: Signs as Harry Potter Characters (based on their signs)
title: Signs as Harry Potter Characters (based on their signs)
body:
Aries: Fred & George Weasley, James Potter, Teddy Lupin (maybe)
Taurus: Teddy Lupin (maybe)
Gemini: Draco Malfoy, Barty Crouch Sr.,
Cancer: Dudley Dursley, Dobby, Ignotus Peverell
Leo: Ginny Weasley, Neville Longbottom, Percy Weasley, Harry Potter
Virgo: Hermione Granger, Dolores Umbridge,
Libra: Minerva McGonagall
Scorpio: Molly Weasley, Angelina Johnson 
Sagittarius: Bill Weasley, Charlie Weasley, Rubeus Hagrid, Sirius Black
Capricorn: Severus Snape, Tom Riddle
Aquarius: Luna Lovegood, Gilderoy Lockhart, Arthur Weasley, Lily Evans
Pisces: Remus Lupin, Ron Weasley, Sybill Trelawney

summary: Has it ever occurred to you that in PoA Remus Lupin may just have taken the Hogwarts Express- for the first time after about 15...
body:
Has it ever occurred to you that in PoA Remus Lupin may just have taken the Hogwarts Express- for the first time after about 15 years, I might add- just for old times’ sake? The train contained memories of youth’s joyful laughter, warmth, chewy Pumpkin Pasties and blissfulness in contrast to the dark times ahead of these kids.

And maybe- just maybe, the compartment he sat in was the cabin he, Peter, Sirius and James (and later Lily, Marlene, and co.) would always sit in?

Maybe that was the compartment where he first met his best friends in first year. (the one Lily and Snape left because James and Sirius were assholes)

The compartment in which they exchanged stories of their holidays and developed inside jokes.

The compartment in which James, Sirius and Peter confronted Remus about his, um, ‘furry little problem’.

The compartment James first transfomed in (the antlers remained, he hid them under his hat until they could get Madam Pomfrey’s help in school).

The compartment Sirius and Remus had their first kiss in.

The compartment in which, on return from Hogwarts at the end of Seventh Year, they hugged and shared *manly* tears, and bid each other farewell. (It’s not really goodbye, we’re still attending Potter family dinner on Saturdays!)

The compartment Remus returned to fifteen years later, when two of the original four are dead, one is in Azkaban, and one has lost all will to live.

The compartment in which Remus, when he opens his eyes, gets the shock of his life to see James sitting next to him.

Wait. That’s not James…

The compartment in which they exchanged stories of their holidays and developed inside jokes.

The compartment in which James, Sirius and Peter confronted Remus about his, um, ‘furry little problem’.

The compartment James first transfomed in (the antlers remained, he hid them under his hat until they could get Madam Pomfrey’s help in school).

The compartment Sirius and Remus had their first kiss in.

The compartment in which, on return from Hogwarts at the end of Seventh Year, they hugged and shared *manly* tears, and bid each other farewell. (It’s not really goodbye, we’re still attending Potter family dinner on Saturdays!)

The compartment Remus returned to fifteen years later, when two of the original four are dead, one is in Azkaban, and one has lost all will to live.

The compartment in which Remus, when he opens his eyes, gets the shock of his life to see James sitting next to him.

Wait. That’s not James…
trail.content:
Has it ever occurred to you that in PoA Remus Lupin may just have taken the Hogwarts Express- for the first time after about 15 years, I might add- just for old times’ sake? The train contained memories of youth’s joyful laughter, warmth, chewy Pumpkin Pasties and blissfulness in contrast to the dark times ahead of these kids.

And maybe- just maybe, the compartment he sat in was the cabin he, Peter, Sirius and James (and later Lily, Marlene, and co.) would always sit in?

Maybe that was the compartment where he first met his best friends in first year. (the one Lily and Snape left because James and Sirius were assholes)

The compartment in which they exchanged stories of their holidays and developed inside jokes.

The compartment in which James, Sirius and Peter confronted Remus about his, um, ‘furry little problem’.

The compartment James first transfomed in (the antlers remained, he hid them under his hat until they could get Madam Pomfrey’s help in school).

The compartment Sirius and Remus had their first kiss in.

The compartment in which, on return from Hogwarts at the end of Seventh Year, they hugged and shared *manly* tears, and bid each other farewell. (It’s not really goodbye, we’re still attending Potter family dinner on Saturdays!)

The compartment Remus returned to fifteen years later, when two of the original four are dead, one is in Azkaban, and one has lost all will to live.

The compartment in which Remus, when he opens his eyes, gets the shock of his life to see James sitting next to him.

Wait. That’s not James…
